类的使用
prezoom.model.GObject.GObject

  • 使用GObject的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    prezoom.controller  
    prezoom.model.GObject  

    • prezoom.controller中GObject的使用

      声明为GObject的prezoom.controller中的字段 
      修饰符和类型 字段 说明
      static GObject GObjectManager.draggedObj
      the object that is being dragged on the canvas
      static GObject GObjectManager.drawingObj
      the new object that is created by drawing
      static GObject GObjectManager.inspectedObj
      the selected object that is showed on the inspector panel
      static GObject GObjectManager.resizedObj
      the object that is being resized
      static GObject GObjectManager.resizePointObj
      the object that shows the resize point
      类型参数类型为GObject的prezoom.controller中的字段 
      修饰符和类型 字段 说明
      protected static java.util.ArrayList<GObject> GObjectManager.gObjectList
      the array list that holds all the GObject
      (专用程序包) java.util.ArrayList<GObject> SaveLoadManager.gObjectList
      all GObjects
      返回GObject的prezoom.controller中的方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      static GObject GObjectManager.findSelected​(double x, double y)
      find if the given x,y select an object
      static GObject GObjectManager.findSelected​(java.awt.geom.Point2D point2D)
      find if the given x,y select an object
      static GObject GObjectManager.updateResizing​(java.awt.geom.Point2D start, java.awt.geom.Point2D current, GObject obj, java.lang.String type)
      when dragging mouse to resize shapes, use this function to update the shape to have dynamic resizing effect
      参数类型为GObject的prezoom.controller中的方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      static void GObjectManager.addGObject​(GObject obj)
      add a graphical object to the canvas
      static void GObjectManager.deleteGObject​(GObject obj)
      delete an object.
      static GObject GObjectManager.updateResizing​(java.awt.geom.Point2D start, java.awt.geom.Point2D current, GObject obj, java.lang.String type)
      when dragging mouse to resize shapes, use this function to update the shape to have dynamic resizing effect

      prezoom.model.GObject中GObject的子类 
      修饰符和类型 类 说明

      The Circle class
      class  GImage
      The Image Object
      class  GLine
      The line objects
      class  GOval
      The oval objects
      class  GRectangle
      The rectangle objects
